name: My Gas
short_description:
This application lets you manage all your car related fuel comsumption. 
At the first screen you will see an easy calculator that provides you information about the ratio between gasoline and ethanol prices. Based on this ratio you might decide which fuel type you will use. 

After refueling you may read the total amount of fuel that you have just bought and the distance that your car has travelled. Just enter just information in the average screen and you will know the average comsumption of your car. Press the save button and you will store it in a history. Back to the first screen you can read all average comsumption history.
Developed by: Breno Santos Araújo
email: breno.araujo@acm.org
linkedin: http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=29147796
